summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Thomas H. Downing. The documents primarily concern the Assassination Records Review Board's (ARRB) notifications regarding the postponement of Social Security numbers in HSCA staff payroll records to protect personal privacy. The documents also include payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for various HSCA employees, such as Miriam Rudder, Ann Furnald Taylor, Robert K. Tanenbaum, and Joyce Ann Larkin. The ARRB issued final determination notifications regarding these records, addressing privacy concerns and setting future review dates.
